hotel_name: APPARTEMENT NEUF ET BIEN SITUE AVEC UN CLASSEMENT
description:
Located in Saint Malo, near Sillon Beach, Eventail Beach and Bas-Sablons Beach, APPARTEMENT NEUF ET BIEN SITUE AVEC UN CLASSEMENT has a terrace. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The apartment features facilities for disabled guests.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

Hotel Elizabeth, situated in the historic Ship Owners district inside the walls of Saint-Malo offers an atmosphere of yesterday with the modern comforts of today. Saint-Malo Marina is 180 metres away.

Guestrooms are distributed among 2 buildings, Les Armateurs, which includes the superior rooms and Les Skippers, 50 metres away, with the standard rooms. The former was built in the early 17th century and the latter is a more modern building. All rooms are comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Free Wi-Fi internet in the entire property. In the stone-walled cellar, enjoy your breakfast under 400 year old exposed wooden beams.

In the vicinity of Hotel Elizabeth you will find the 18th-century House of Pirates, Saint Servan, the city of Aleth, and the museum of Cap Horniers. You can also enjoy a walk on the ramparts and the beach of Sillon.

hotel_name: Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo
description:
Offering city views, Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo is an accommodation located in Saint Malo, 1.8 km from Bas-Sablons Beach and 1.3 km from Palais du Grand Large. It is situated 1.3 km from Eventail Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Sillon Beach.

The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo, National Fort and Grand Bé.

Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers luxurious rooms and guests have free access to spa area and swimming pool.

Guest rooms are air-conditioned and feature parquet flooring. They include flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a spacious bathroom.

The terrace has a panoramic sea view. The open-air hot tub is located on the patio. The modern fitness room includes the latest exercise equipment and massages are offered at an extra cost.

The lounge bar in the Oceania Saint Malo offers a variety of cocktails and drinks and can accommodate private cocktail parties. It also offers a dining menu for evening meals. Breakfast is served daily.

The Oceania is 1.5 km from the Saint-Malo Train Station and 7 km from the airport. On-site parking is available. English, Spanish, German and French are spoken at reception.

Situated in the centre of Colmar, Les Souvenirs d'Alsace is a recently renovated accommodation, which features soundproof rooms. Free WiFi is available in this apartment, set less than 1 km from House of the Heads and a 7-minute walk from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Colmar Train Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 3.1 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

hotel_name: L'Ours de Colmar - Appartements en centre ville
description:
L'Ours de Colmar is set in Colmar, 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. House of the Heads is 500 metres away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All units have a cable flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A toaster and coffee machine are also offered. Every unit comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels are provided. A free laundry service can be requested for any stay of at least 4 days.

Colmar Expo is 2.6 km from l'Ours de Colmar. Basel Airport is 55 km from the property. Subject to availability, private parking is possible for an extra charge.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms have a shower. Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

Located in the heart of Lyon, on the Presqu’île District, Republik Hotel offers accommodation with a 24-hour reception and free WiFi. Place Bellecour and Bellecour Metro Station are both 230 metres from the property.

Each air-conditioned room comes with a kettle, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and is fitted with a bath or a shower. A baby cot can be added to the room upon request and subject to prior approval from the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning, including bread, pastries, cereal, cold meat, cheese, jam, hot drinks and fruit juice. A range of amenities including shops, bars and restaurants are available within 200 metres of the property.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within a 15-minute walk from Republik Hotel, while the Cordliers district is 600 metres away. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.2 km away. Public parking is available a 2-minute walk away.

Located on Lyon Presqu’île, a 10-minute walk from Vieux Lyon, Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République offers free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer. Each room comes with a bottle of water, free toiletries and an international plug socket.

Buffet breakfast and express breakfast options are available daily at a supplement. In the evening, guests may relax in the hotel’s Plaza Bar. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are offered in the lobby.

Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is 500 metres from Cordeliers Metro Station, while Place Bellecour is a 7-minute walk away. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 13 minutes away by car.

Hôtel Wilson - Teritoriais located in the Burgundy region a 10-minute walk from the centre of Dijon. It is housed in a 17th-century post house. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Guest rooms overlook Place Wilson or the hotel’s interior courtyard. All rooms are equipped with en suite bathrooms, telephones, satellite TV and are accessible by lift.

Hôtel Wilson - Teritoria has a bar. Parking in the courtyard is available, subject to availability with extra fees.  The Musée des Beaux-Arts de Dijon and Palace of the Dukes and Estates of Burgundy are a 6-minute drive away.

Boasting a spa bath, Le Loisy is set in Dijon. The property has inner courtyard views and is 1.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo and 1.1 km from Dijon Train Station. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free apartment features a hot tub.

Featuring a DVD player, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 1.1 km from the apartment, while Saint-Philibert Church is 700 metres away. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km from the property.

B&B HOTEL Dijon Nord Zénith is a disabled-friendly hotel located in Dijon, 1 km from Zénith de Dijon Convention Centre.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a laptop and and a desk. Other facilities include a wardrobe, heating and air conditioning. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Some rooms can accommodate disabled guests, other rooms are able to accommodate smokers.

Buffet breakfast is available every morning at an extra charge.

The hotel is 6.5 km from Dijon Train Station. The property is also a 8-minute drive from Dijon Congrexpo Convention Centre. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 51 km from the property.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Dijon, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, Holiday Inn Express Dijon is located in Saint-Apollinaire. The air-conditioned hotel offers 24-hour reception, a sun terrace and a bar. Luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access are available.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a walk-in shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

There is also an electric kettle in every room.  A buffet breakfast is available daily and vending machines with snacks are provided on site.

The hotel is situated 3 km from Dijon centre and 4.6 km from the train station.  The property offers free, secured parking.

Located a 5-minute walk from the Dijon train station, the Logis Hotel Darcy Dijon Centre is across from the Place Darcy underground public parking lot, which is monitored 24 hours a day and is accessible via Rue du Dr Chaussier.

Regional specialties are served at the onsite gourmet restaurant. Wine tasting and a bistro-style cuisine are proposed at the hotel’s wine bar.

hotel_name: B&B HOTEL Dijon Valmy Toison d'or
description:
B&B HOTEL Dijon Valmy Toison d'or is located in Dijon, within 4.9 km of Dijon Congrexpo and 6.7 km of Dijon Train Station. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Zénith de Dijon.

At the hotel rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at B&B HOTEL Dijon Valmy Toison d'or can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 6.8 km from the accommodation, while CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 7 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 54 km away.

Located in the centre of Dijon, just a 3-minute walk from the Place de la République, Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République offers a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access throughout. The Fine Arts Museum is a 15-minute walk away.

All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a living area with a TV, a desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The fully equipped kitchen includes a microwave, stovetop and refrigerator.

You can prepare homemade meals in the studio or apartment. A buffet breakfast is also served each morning in the property's breakfast room and children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. Guests can also find grocery shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Classed as an eco-friendly building due to its photovoltaic roof, the aparthotel is easily accessible by public transport. The tramway and L3 bus provide direct access to Dijon Train Station, which is 500 metres from Dijon Congrexpo Exhibition Centre. Private parking is available on site at a surcharge.

Set in Dijon and only 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, La Closerie des Cordeliers offers accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is located 1.4 km from Dijon Train Station, 1.3 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 3.2 km from Universite Tramway Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.9 km from Dijon Congrexpo.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 4.2 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 49 km from the property.

The Hôtel Le Jura is located in the city centre, 200 metres from the train station and a 10-minute tram ride from the Palais de Congrès. The hotel offers rooms with a garden view and free WiFi internet access.

Most of the spacious guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and are soundproofed.

The Hôtel Le Jura serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest rooms. You can also enjoy a drink from the bar and there are vending machines available.

Guests can enjoy an indoor heated swimming pool, a hammam and a fitness room.

Orangerie Jeannin is situated in the Old Town district of Dijon, less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church, a 18-minute walk from Dijon Train Station and 1.4 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station. The property is around 1.9 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station, 3.3 km from Universite Tramway Station and 4.6 km from Zénith de Dijon. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Dijon Congrexpo is 1.3 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Quetigny Centre Tramway Station is 5.4 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km away.

In the centre of Dijon, capital of Burgundy, close to the Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne, Hotel Le Jacquemart enjoys a privileged location in the district of the Antique shops.

Whether on a holiday or on a business trip, enjoy the comfort of 31 elegant rooms ranging from economic to premium. The hotel's welcoming staff will be more than happy to help you make the most of your stay.

While in Dijon, make sure you spare some time to visit the art museum and the Notre-Dame church with its famous owl-shaped carving.

hotel_name: Le Petit Palais Notre Dame - Heart of Dijon - With AC
description:
Located in Dijon, 1.1 km from Dijon Train Station and less than 1 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, Le Petit Palais Notre Dame - Heart of Dijon - With AC provides accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This recently renovated apartment is located 1.4 km from Dijon Congrexpo and 600 metres from Saint-Philibert Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 4 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Universite Tramway Station is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Zénith de Dijon is 4.7 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km from the property.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Dijon, 5.2 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station, Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options.

Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace.

Dijon - Bourgogne Airport Tramway Station is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Universite Tramway Station is 6.8 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km from the property.

hotel_name: Appart Cosy et Spacieux Centre Historique avec Parking Gratuit
description:
Located in Dijon and only 1.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo, Appart Cosy et Spacieux Centre Historique avec Parking Gratuit provides accommodation with city views, free WiFi and free private parking. This recently renovated apartment is located 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 1.3 km from Dijon Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with an a bath or shower. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A bar can be found on-site.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Universite Tramway Station is 3.4 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km from the property.

This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers is located in the historic centre of Dijon. The aparthotel offers en suite rooms and self-catering accommodations. Guests can relax in the garden or in the steam bath.

All of the accommodations at Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers have a private shower room with free toiletries and hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access and a cable TV are also available.

The apartments have an equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and an electric kettle. Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The property is 500 metres from the Palais des Ducs and Fines Arts Museum, and 1.50 km from Dijon ville train station. Dijon Congrexpo is 1.5 km away.

Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access. The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away. The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University. Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

Located less than 1 km from Dijon Train Station, Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott offers 4-star accommodation in Dijon and has a bar. The property is around 4.3 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station, 4.6 km from Universite Tramway Station and 4.8 km from Zénith de Dijon. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a hammam and evening entertainment.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott provides certain rooms with city views, and each room is fitted with a kettle.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott use the gym or relax in the wellness area including an indoor pool, a sauna and a hot tub.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Foch-Gare Tramway Station, Saint-Philibert Church and Dijon Congrexpo. Dole-Jura Airport is 52 km away.

Le Petit Tertre is located in the centre of Dijon, a 3-minute walk from the Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy and offers free Wi-Fi.

All apartments are fully furnished in an 18th century style. The Apartment-Empire has views of the courtyard and is decorated in a Napoléon style.

Guests can have breakfast in their room.

This property is a short walk from the Musée des Beaux Arts de Dijon and the Notre Dame church.

hotel_name: Suite - Le Monge - Dijon Centre Historique
description:
A recently renovated property, Suite - Le Monge - Dijon Centre Historique is situated in Dijon near Dijon Train Station, Foch-Gare Tramway Station. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.8 km from Dijon Congrexpo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Saint-Philibert Church is 300 metres away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Universite Tramway Station is 4.6 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km away.

Set less than 1 km from Dijon Train Station, a 10-minute walk from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 3.1 km from Dijon Congrexpo, Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes offers accommodation located in Dijon. It is situated less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church and features a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchenette including a dishwasher, microwave, fridge and a stovetop. Kitchenware and kettle are also offered. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and cheese are available.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 3.8 km from the aparthotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 4.2 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km away.

Set in a pedestrian district in the heart of Dijon’s historic area, ibis Styles Dijon Central is just 1 km from Dijon Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The ibis Styles Dijon Central boasts air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms, as well as a conference room enjoying the support of a professional staff and a reliable organization.

The success of the ibis Styles Dijon Central is closely linked to its gastronomic restaurant, Le Central and its brasserie-style restaurant. After a tasty meal, you can discover the city of Dijon and its countless landmarks.

The Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy is 400 metres from the hotel.

Okko Hotels Strasbourg Centre is located on the Malraux Peninsula in Strasbourg, 200 metres from Winston Churchill Tram Station. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar.

Okko Hotels Strasbourg Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. They also have a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge. Every evening, we invite you to join us at the Club to experience a moment of greed and conviviality around the guest table: the aperitivo, composed of a selection of local products, often organic and always good.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property. Guests can also access a sauna and a fitness area for free and buy local products in the on-site shop. Computers are at guests' disposal in the business area.

The Botanical Gardens is 1.8 km from Okko Hotels Strasbourg Centre, while St. Paul's Church and  Strasbourg Cathedral are 1.9 km away. The property is also 1.5 km from Strasbourg History Museum. Strasbourg International Airport is 16 km from the property.

Set in Dijon, 300 metres from Dijon Train Station, Nomad Hotel Dijon offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a TV with satellite channels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at Nomad Hotel Dijon.

At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of an indoor swimming pool.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 300 metres from Nomad Hotel Dijon, while Saint-Philibert Church is 700 metres from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km away.

Located in Strasbourg within 900 metres of Strasbourg Christmas Market, City Residence Access Strasbourg features accommodation with a TV and a kitchenette.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

The 'Petite France' is a 12-minute walk from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.2 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

The Hotel des Tonneliers - Restaurant La Cruche is in a very central location, 450 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from Strasbourg Train Station. It offers free WiFi throughout the property. In summer there is an outdoor terrace.

The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a toilet and a bath or a shower. They also include a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

La Cruche D’or is just a short walk from the picturesque Petite France district. It is also close to the famous Palais des Rohan museum.

Conveniently located in the Bourse-Esplanade district of Strasbourg, Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile is located 1.4 km from St. Paul's Church, 1.3 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and 1 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers soundproof units and is set 700 metres from Strasbourg History Museum.

At the apartment complex, the units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a stovetop and kitchenware.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

European Parliament is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 11 km from Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile.

Ideally located in the heart of the pedestrian quarter, close to the Palais des Ducs.

Formerly known as the Au Pauvre Diable shop, the building houses 53 nicely furnished apartments ranging from single to quadruple. Every apartment is equipped with air-conditioning, a full kitchenette with hot hobs, fridge and microwave, a safe and a television.

While in Dijon, make sure you take some time to discover the city's famous products such as its mustard, gingerbread and blackcurrant liquor. The city also houses an auditorium and a famous university.

Boasting a shared lounge, Ibis Budget Strasbourg Centre Republique is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 700 metres from St. Paul's Church and 1.2 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre. With a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at Ibis Budget Strasbourg Centre Republique.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include European Parliament, Strasbourg Cathedral and Strasbourg History Museum. Strasbourg International Airport is 12 km from the property.

Hotel ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France is situated in Strasbourg’s Petite France quarter, just 450 metres from Strasbourg Train Station. The air-conditioned hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access and an on-site bar.

The guest rooms at ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France include a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. They each have a telephone, a work desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Newspapers and luggage storage are available for free on site.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 800 metres from the hotel and Place Kléber is 650 metres away. The property is 130 metres from Faubourg National Tram Stop and 16 km from Strasbourg Airport.

Boasting a bar, Hotel Arok is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 2.4 km from St. Paul's Church and 1.3 km from Strasbourg History Museum. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna, or enjoy city views.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All units feature a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Hotel Arok offers a sun terrace.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.3 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

Located next to Place Kléber, this Citadines Apart'hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station. It offers fully-furnished apartments serviced by an elevator and equipped with free Wi-Fi access.

Apartments at the Citadines Apart'hotel Strasbourg Kléber feature a flat-screen TV, DVD player and desk in the seating area. They each have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher and linen and towels are provided.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room.

Private parking is available on site at an additional cost. The hotel also has a launderette and offers a dry-cleaning service.

Strasbourg Cathedral and the Petite France area of the city are a 5-minute walk from the aparthotel. The Alsace Museum is 750 metres away.

Featuring self-contained accommodation, Le 32 is ideally located in the centre of Strasbourg near the cathedral and the famous Gutenberg square.

The apartments and studios at Le 32 all have a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Each has a dining area and a fully-equipped kitchenette that includes a fridge, a microwave and a Nespresso coffee maker.

The decor is contemporary with fresh white walls and modern furniture.  Most of the rooms have their own private bathroom with a shower.

Conveniently located in the Alsace region, Le 32 is 17 km from Strasbourg airport and 2.5 km from the train station. The property is located in the pedestrian zone and the public parking is located 100 or 250 metres away.

The Hotel Suisse has a central location just behind Strasbourg Cathedral. It offers family-run accommodation with free WiFi access and a summer terrace. The historic Petite France district is just a 10-minute walk away

Guest rooms at the Hotel Suisse are equipped with en suite facilities, a TV, telephone.
As our hotel is a 14th century building, our rooms do not dispose of air-conditioning, but we provide fans in every room.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a view of the cathedral’s steeple. All rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The property has a 24-hour front desk.

The Hotel Suisse is ideally situated for visiting the city on foot. It is near the River Ill and next to the famous Palais des Rohan Museum. "Bateliers parking is available at 300 meters from the property at 22€/24h

Please note that only some of our rooms can host pets.

hotel_name: Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte & Restaurant Louisiane
description:
Set near the River Ill, Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane is 2 km from the historic district. It features a restaurant with a summer terrace and a garden.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

Regional specialities are served in restaurant La Louisiane and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 06:30 until 11:00 at Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

This Hotel offers a free private parking lot on site.
 Strasbourg Golf Club is 15 km from the hotel. Strasbourg International Airport is only 19 km away.

Please note that pets cannot be left alone in the rooms.

Please note that hotel rules are applicable for all reservations. Any stay involve the acceptation of the hotel rules, this guide of rules is available on request at the reception.

This residence offers comfortable, self catering accommodation. It is in a quiet road in the city centre, a 5-minute walk from the historic Petite France district and Strasbourg Cathedral.

The studios at the Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber are equipped with free wired Internet and accessible by lift. They also have a flat-screen TV, work desk and a private bathroom. All studios have a fully equipped kitchenette.

Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber is accessible by car and a public car park is just 2 minutes away. It is well-linked by the tram to the rest of the city and just a 10-minute walk to the train station.

Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare Bristol, Strasbourg Centre Gare is set just across the street from the TGV Train Station.

From the reception woodworks to stylishly rooms, Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare Bristol, Strasbourg Centre Gare provides a pleasant setting for family and leisure time as well as for business trips. It features 33 non smoking, soundproofed and air conditioned rooms, of which 2 are for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is served daily in the communal lounge. It consists of orange juice, hot drinks, fruit compote, cheese, cold meats, eggs, croissants, bread, jam, butter and local products.

The hotel also benefits from a central location from which you can easily discover the city and its amazing architectural and cultural heritage.

Offering city views, Les toits de Gutenberg is an accommodation situated in Strasbourg, 1.6 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and 200 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral. It is set 1.1 km from St. Paul's Church and features a lift. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Strasbourg History Museum.

With free WiFi, this homestay offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are offered in the homestay. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

European Parliament is 3.9 km from the homestay, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 4.6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km away.

hotel_name: Carpe Diem Home - Au pied de la Cathédrale
description:
Located a 1-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 700 metres from the Petite France district, Carpe Diem Home offers accommodation with a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Located on an upper floor and accessed by stairs, each unit has a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, as well as a microwave and kettle.

The European Parliament is a 15-minute drive away and the Alsatian Museum is 450 metres away. Strasbourg International Airport is 12 km away.

Château de Pourtalès is located in the north area of Strasbourg. It has witnessed years of European history, welcoming some of the most important musicians, philosophers and poets. It provides a spa area with Finnish sauna and relaxing facilities and which has direct access to the garden.

Château de Pourtalès offers rooms set in one of the property's 3 buildings, each with a different ambiance. description:

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant. A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel. Avranches is a 23-minute drive away. Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey. It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale. Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 7 km away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has en suite facilities.

The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.

A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

Hotel Gérando is located in the Montmartre area in Paris. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a luggage storage and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are also serviced by a lift.

The Gérando’s continental breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room.

Restaurant and bars can be found within walking distance. Hotel Gérando is a 2-minute walk from Anvers Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Sacré-Cœur Basilica and a 14-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge.

This stylish air-conditioned hotel is located in the West of Paris, 400 metres from the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern rooms, decorated with warm colours.

The rooms at Star Champs-Elysées are also equipped with satellite TV, a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. You can relax in the hotel’s lounge, which features a medieval décor and period fireplace.

Star Champs Elysées welcomes you 24/7 with multilingual staff. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and there is a laundry service.

Hotel Star Champs-Elysées is 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro and RER Station, which provide direct access to Disneyland, La Defense, The Louvre Museum and the Montmartre district. The famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées is less than 10 minutes away on foot.

The hotel offers 3 types of breakfast every morning :

The full buffet breakfast, served in our breakfast room at 23€ per day and per person.
The breakfast served directly in your room, at 19€ per day and per person (this is the formula proposed for our bed and breakfast rates).
The express breakfast which can be taken away, at 9€ per day and per person.

hotel_name: Apartments for Work in City Center
description:
Situated within 1 km of Pompidou Centre and 1.7 km of Gare de l'Est in the centre of Paris, Apartments for Work in City Center features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, every unit comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Louvre Museum, Gare du Nord and Notre Dame Cathedral. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km from the property.

hotel_name: Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
description:
Situated just 300 metres from Gare de Lyon TGV Train, RER and Metro Stations in central Paris, this air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception and ticket service. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided. A vending machine selling drinks is located at reception.

Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located just 500 metres from the banks of the River Seine. The trendy nightlife of Bastille is a 10-minute walk away. Public parking is available nearby.

Breakfast is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor from 7am to 10.30 am. An "express" breakfast formula including 1 hot drink, 1 fruit juice and 2 viennoiseries is also available (to request to the hotel).

hotel_name: Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA
description:
Situated in Paris and with Pompidou Centre reachable within 1.6 km, Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. The hotel provides an indoor pool, sauna and room service.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle.

Guests at Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Gare de l'Est is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Gare du Nord is 2.1 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

hotel_name: GuestReady - Atelier rénové sous verrière à Paris
description:
GuestReady - Atelier rénové sous verrière à Paris is situated in the 10th arr. District of Paris, 1.2 km from Gare du Nord, 1.8 km from Louvre Museum and 1.9 km from Opéra Garnier. The 3-star apartment is 1.4 km from Pompidou Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Gare de l'Est is less than 1 km away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Paris, like cycling.

Pigalle Metro Station is 2.3 km from GuestReady - Atelier rénové sous verrière à Paris, while Notre Dame Cathedral is 2.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 19 km away.

hotel_name: The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud
description:
Situated in Amiens, 3.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens, The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.8 km from Amiens Train Station.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a seating area. All units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Berny's Museum is 3.7 km from The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud, while The Floating gardens Park is 4.5 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 61 km away.

Offering city views and free bikes, Coeur de ville features accommodation ideally located in Amiens, within a short distance of Amiens Train Station, Berny's Museum and The Floating gardens Park. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment offers outdoor play equipment. A car rental service is available at Coeur de ville.

Zénith d'Amiens is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 200 metres from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 65 km away.

Offering city views, Hypercentre: vue cathédrale - verrière - cosy is an accommodation located in Amiens, 2.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 600 metres from Berny's Museum. The property is around 1.5 km from The Floating gardens Park, 600 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 3.4 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 1.1 km away.

This apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Amiens Golf Club is 8.6 km from Hypercentre: vue cathédrale - verrière - cosy, while French-Australian Museum is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 64 km from the accommodation.

Set 3 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 500 metres from Berny's Museum and 1.5 km from The Floating gardens Park, Chaleureux studio hyper centre offers accommodation situated in Amiens. The property is located 600 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens, 3.7 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne and 8.9 km from Amiens Golf Club. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is less than 1 km away.

The accommodation comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

French-Australian Museum is 23 km from Chaleureux studio hyper centre, while Somme Trench Museum is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

Offering quiet street views, Les Hortensias Blancs Studio is an accommodation situated in Amiens, 3 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 1.1 km from The Floating gardens Park. The property is set 500 metres from Berny's Museum, 500 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 4.7 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 1.1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with garden views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Amiens Golf Club is 8.4 km from the apartment, while French-Australian Museum is 24 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 67 km away.

Located in the heart of Paris in the 11th district, Hôtel Paris Voltaire is just a 13-minute walk from the famous Place des Vosges. It offers an elevator, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast serving orange juice, hot drinks, French pastries, jam and cheese is available every morning in the breakfast room at Hôtel Paris Voltaire.

Voltaire Metro Station is ideally located a 3-minute walk away and allows direct access to the Grands Boulevards and Galeries Lafayette. Place de la Bastille is a 12-minute walk from the hotel.

Hôtel Anne de Bretagne is located in the old walled city of Saint Malo, 270 metres from Saint-Malo Marina, close to the ferry terminal and the exhibition centre. It offers 24-hour reception and bar service.

Hôtel Anne de Bretagne has simple, comfortable guestrooms with a TV. Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the hotel free of charge.

The hotel Hôtel Anne de Bretagne also has computers for guests at reception and serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

hotel_name: Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Rouen, Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection, offers accommodation with a literary theme in honour of the writer Gustave Flaubert. It is located 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included in each of the elegant rooms. All rooms have private bathrooms.

Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests are invited to relax in the hotel's cocktail lounge. The hotel is situated across the street from a number of French and international restaurants.

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

hotel_name: MBA Splendide Appart Saint-Michel Paris Centre
description:
Located in Paris, near Luxembourg Gardens, Notre Dame Cathedral and Pompidou Centre, MBA Splendide Appart Saint-Michel Paris Centre features free WiFi. The property is set 2.4 km from Rodin Museum, 3 km from Musée de l'Orangerie and 3.3 km from Opéra Bastille. The property is 1 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Sainte-Chapelle.

The apartment is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a living room. There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchenette complete with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near MBA Splendide Appart Saint-Michel Paris Centre include Orsay Museum, Louvre Museum and Tuileries Garden. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Located just 250 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, this 3-star hotel is set at the heart of the international business district. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 17-minute drive away. This hotel has a 24-hour reception and free internet access.

All soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels. Each colourful room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotel Lille Europe are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can use the microwave in the breakfast room featuring panoramic views.

Lille Europe hotel is accessible via the N356 motorway. The Opéra House is 750 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Basilica is a 10-minute walk away. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the hotel and the Grand Palais is 1.3 km from the hotel. Private parking on site is available and upon request only.

Situated in central Paris near Place de la République and with an art deco façade, Hôtel Gabriel Paris features room service, a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk.

With an uncluttered Zen atmosphere and contemporary decor, this luxurious boutique hotel offers a private and elegant setting to create a quiet sense of relaxation.

Guest rooms are stylishly decorated and equipped with modern en suite facilities including a flat-screen TV, an iPod dock and free, unlimited Wi-Fi access. Rooms are also equipped with a Night Cove digital sleep aide.

The bar lounge captures a surrealist decor.

République Metro Station is just 350 metres away, providing direct access to the Opéra Garnier.

Located in Isigny-le-Buat, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, Le Jardin B&B provides accommodation with pool with a view, free private parking, a garden and barbecue facilities. The property features garden views and is 32 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 32 km from Mont Saint-Michel. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, some units have a private entrance, dining area, fireplace and dishwasher. All units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace and some have pool views. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, pancakes and fruits are available.

You can play table tennis at the bed and breakfast. A water park is available on-site and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of Le Jardin B&B.

Granville Train Station is 45 km from the accommodation, while Champrepus Zoo is 46 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 92 km from the property.

This hotel is located in Paris’s Bastille district, 100 metres from the Gare de Lyon, in a quiet street. It offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and private bathrooms.

Guests of the Hotel Du Midi can relax in the TV room or the lounge, which have internet access.

Additional services include a 24-hour reception.

Maison Traversière is a few minutes’ walk from the Bastille, Opera Bastille, the Seine and the Place des Vosges.

Set in the heart of Opéra, just a few minutes from a chic shopping area including the famous Galeries Lafayette, the theatres district and lively Montmartre. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned rooms at the New Hotel Opéra have displays of unique artwork which are painted by a local artist. They also feature a private bathroom and satellite on a flat-screen TV. The roof-top room has wooden floors with views over Paris.

Newhotel has facilities such as a 24-hour front desk, an elevator that gives access to all rooms and a terrace with a garden that guests can enjoy breakfast on during the summer.

New Hotel Opéra is located in a calm street near the Casino de Paris and Sacré Cœur. It is 140 metres to Metro Station Liege and 750 metres to Metro Station Saint-Lazare, so guests can discover the rest of Paris.

Providing inner courtyard views, Studios Pasteur- Paris XVe is located in the 15th arr. District of Paris, 2.4 km from Luxembourg Gardens and 2.6 km from Orsay Museum. The property is situated 2.6 km from Eiffel Tower, 3.1 km from Sainte-Chapelle and 3.1 km from Musée de l'Orangerie. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Rodin Museum is 1.8 km away.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette features a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles is 3.5 km from Studios Pasteur- Paris XVe, while Tuileries Garden is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

The Garden Saint Martin is located next to Paris’s Canal Saint-Martin. It is just 1.5km from Gare du Nord and offers free WiFi internet access.

The Garden Saint Martin offers rooms with a TV and a private bathroom. Some guest rooms also have a view of the hotel's patio.

A continental breakfast is served daily and the Garden Saint Martin also provides a 24-hour reception.

The Garden Hotel is located a 5-minute walk from Republique Metro Station which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier, Place de la Concorde and the Champs-Elysées.

WS Opéra - Duphot features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Paris, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Popular points of interest nearby include Musée de l'Orangerie, Tuileries Garden and Orsay Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near WS Opéra - Duphot include Opéra Garnier, Louvre Museum and Gare Saint-Lazare. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotel_name: Vintage Paris Gare du Nord by Hiphophostels
description:
Set in the 9th district, this air-conditioned hotel is located just 500 metres from Gare du Nord Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge. Vintage Hostel Gare du Nord has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi.

Each guest room has a private bathroom and feature a LCD TV. A free fitness room is at your disposal on site.

Anvers Metro Station is 250 metres away, providing direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. Saint-Pierre fabric market is just 450 metres from the hotel and the Sacré-Coeur Basilique is a 10-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Stunning architect studio near Le Marais
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Stunning architect studio near Le Marais is an accommodation situated in Paris, 2.6 km from Gare du Nord and 3.1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. It is set 1.5 km from Gare de l'Est and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Pompidou Centre is 1.8 km away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Louvre Museum is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Opéra Bastille is 2 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 19 km away.

The France Albion is a 24-hour reception hotel with free WiFi and luggage storage. It is located a 10-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayettes Shopping Centre and from Opera Garnier.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and wardrobe. The en-suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is available daily in the cellar.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Notre-Dame-de-Lorette metro Station which provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

hotel_name: Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est
description:
Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est is located in the 10th arr. District of Paris, 1.6 km from La Cigale Concert Hall, 700 metres from Gare de l'Est and 1.7 km from Pigalle Metro Station. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 1958, you will have access to free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Gare du Nord.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Sacré-Coeur is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Pompidou Centre is 3.4 km from the property. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 20 km away.

Located opposite Gare du Nord Train Station, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Sacre-Coeur and the Montmartre district of the city are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Each soundproofed guest room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms at Hotel Flanelles Paris offer an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Additional services offered include a 24-hour reception desk and a luggage storage room.

The hotel is located 1 km from Canal Saint-Martin and 1.5 km from Place de la République. Gare du Nord Metro Station offers direct access to Notre-Dame Cathedral.

Located on the left bank in central Paris, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the departure point of the Bateaux Mouches cruise boats. It has a 24-hour reception and a lounge with a computer and marble flooring.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a mini fridge, cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a bathroom including a hairdryer at hotel Beaugrenelle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room at Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Dupleix Metro Station is 240 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées, the Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse Railway Station.

Providing free WiFi throughout the property, HOTEL FORMIO is situated in Paris, 2.2 km from Luxembourg Gardens and 2.8 km from Sainte-Chapelle. The property is around 2.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 2.9 km from Opéra Bastille and 4.4 km from Pompidou Centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL FORMIO also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available daily at HOTEL FORMIO.

Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Rodin Museum is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 4.6 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km from the property.

Midway between the Latin Quarter and Bibliothèque François Mitterrand, this Citadines Austerlitz Paris is a 3-minute walk from the Campo Formio Métro station. It is a 10-minute walk from Gare d'Austerlitz.

Citadines Apart'hôtel Austerlitz features 50 apartments, including studios and a 2-room apartment. They all have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The spacious and luminous breakfast room looks out onto the garden where the terrace is set in the summertime.

The Citadines Apart'hôtel offers a business centre with free Wi-Fi access, a laundry room and on-site car park with spaces subject to availability. Place d'Italie and Jardin des Plantes are both a 10-minute walk away.

In an 18th-century building in the historic 6th district, this elegant hotel (25 rooms) offers air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Odéon Metro Station is 800 ft away.

Satellite TV and a minibar are available in each soundproofed room. Guest rooms have a romantic décor with pastel colors. Some rooms feature a view of Rue de Buci. Enjoy a continental breakfast every morning in the vaulted cellar at Le Regent.

After breakfast, guests can relax in the lounge, which has marble floors and antique furnishings. With a 24-hour front desk, hotel Le Regent provides a tour desk and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Eugène-Delacroix Museum is 1000 ft away. An airport shuttle service is available upon request

Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property.

Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost.

Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute. Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

Cocon centre ville - gare has a patio and is situated in Amiens, within just less than 1 km of Berny's Museum and a 17-minute walk of The Floating gardens Park. The property is around 3.1 km from Zénith d'Amiens, less than 1 km from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 3.8 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is less than 1 km away.

The apartment is located on the ground floor and has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Amiens Golf Club is 8.7 km from the apartment, while French-Australian Museum is 23 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km away.

Featuring a garden and views of city, Ginkgo Maison d'hôtes is a guest house set in a historic building in Amiens, 1.3 km from Amiens Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The guest house features some units with inner courtyard views, and the units are equipped with a kettle. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

description:

At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Please note that we accept pets except on the restaurant

hotel_name: Appartement Charlie, Wifi, Charme, Centre Historique
description:

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering garden views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries.
