The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

hotel_name: Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre
description:
Set in the centre of La Rochelle, just 1.7 km from Concurrence Beach and 1.2 km from La Rochelle Train Station, Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre offers accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 4.2 km from The Minimes Marina, 13 km from Mytiliculture Museum and 400 metres from Bunker La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Popular points of interest near Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Musee du Nouveau Monde. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 6 km from the property.

hotel_name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and 300 metres from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.

The Pierre & Vacances Centre offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.

The residence is serviced by a lift and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.

The Residence Pierre & Vacances Centre is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.

hotel_name: Tour de Nesle La Rochelle Vieux Port 3 etoiles
description:
The charming Hotel de la Tour de Nesle is ideally placed at the heart of the old town, in front of the 2 towers at the entrance to the port.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with simple, functional decor and free Wi-Fi internet access. Some rooms offer a view of the famous medieval towers.

Start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room.

The picturesque area surrounding the Tour de Nesle is full of restaurants, shops and cafes.

Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away. Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.

hotel_name: Le Chalutier - Terrasse - Bassin des Chalutiers
description:
Le Chalutier - Terrasse - Bassin des Chalutiers is a beachfront property located in La Rochelle, 1.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 2.4 km from Minimes. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.6 km from Concurrence Beach.

The apartment with a terrace and sea views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 9 km away.

Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV. Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.

Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Yachtman, The Originals Collection
description:
Located in La Rochelle, Le Yachtman features a heated swimming pool and a terrace with views of the harbour. It offers en suite accommodation and is just 500 metres from the train station.

The guest rooms at Le Yachtman come with a flat-screen TV and some have a lounge area. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi access.

You can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided at Le Yachtman. A buffet breakfast with fruit salad, honey and orange juice is served every morning in the dining room, which offers views of the Old Port.

Nearby sights include La Rochelle Aquarium, La Rochelle Towers and the medieval town centre. Paid private parking is possible at a nearby location.

hotel_name: Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi
description:
Offering quiet street views, Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi is an accommodation located in La Rochelle, 1.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 2.5 km from Concurrence Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The area is popular for walking tours and bike tours, and car hire is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km away.

hotel_name: L'Oasis Marin meublé, lumineux et cosy à 1min à pied du marché dans l'hyper centre de La Rochelle avec TV et Wifi
description:
Offering quiet street views, L'Oasis Marin meublé, lumineux et cosy à 1min à pied du marché dans l'hyper centre de La Rochelle avec TV et Wifi is an accommodation situated in La Rochelle, 1.4 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 1.6 km from L'Espace Encan. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.4 km from Concurrence Beach, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near L'Oasis Marin meublé, lumineux et cosy à 1min à pied du marché dans l'hyper centre de La Rochelle avec TV et Wifi include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Bunker La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located 1.5 km from Concurrence Beach and 2.7 km from Plage Du Roux in the centre of La Rochelle, Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property features city views and is 1 km from L'Espace Encan and less than 1 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from La Rochelle Train Station.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Saint-Sauveur Church and Bunker La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 7 km away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle
description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle,  The hotel and catering school property is around 5 km from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, 1.5 km from Musée Maritime de La Rochelle and 1.8 km from La Rochelle Aquarium. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle. There are also 2 onsite restaurants with a daily menu, where guests can dine upon reservation.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Minimes Marina, Museum of Automata and La Rochelle University. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 11 km from Hôtel Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle.

hotel_name: Appartement Petit coin de paradis - Welkeys
description:
Offering city views, Appartement Petit coin de paradis - Welkeys is an accommodation situated in La Rochelle, 1.8 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 2 km from L'Espace Encan. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 1.4 km from Concurrence Beach.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km from the property.

Les 3 Tours et parking is set in the La Rochelle City Centre district of La Rochelle, 2.3 km from Plage Du Roux, 2.7 km from Minimes and 700 metres from La Rochelle Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.3 km from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km from the property.

Set in Toulouse, 1.8 km from Toulouse Stadium and 3.5 km from Zénith de Toulouse, Magnificent duplex very well located offers air conditioning. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.4 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Popular points of interest near Magnificent duplex very well located include Carmes Metro Station, Jardin Royal and Esquirol Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 8 km away.

Located in Toulouse, just 1 km from the famous Place du Capitole, Odalys City Toulouse Colombélie offers self-catering accommodation.Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

All apartments include a TV . There is a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower.

In the morning, a continental breakfast in the form on a buffet is available.

For guests who wish to explore the local sites on public transport, the Jean-Jaurès Metro Stop is just 700 metres away. Toulouse Expo is 4 km away.

The Gare Matabiau Train Station is a 12-minute walk from the property and Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is located 10 km away.

Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, Appartements Les Rochelais offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property features inner courtyard views and is 2.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 1.1 km from La Rochelle Train Station. The property is 700 metres from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

hotel_name: Hyper centre Toulouse : T3 à Jeanne d Arc
description:
Set in Toulouse, near Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station, Jean-Jaures Metro Station and Compans Caffarelli Metro Station, Hyper centre Toulouse: T3 à Jeanne d Arc features free WiFi. The property is located 4.7 km from Toulouse Stadium, 6 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and 12 km from Diagora Convention Centre. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 4.5 km from Zénith de Toulouse.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Capitole Metro Station, Toulouse-Matabiau Station and Place du Capitole. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 6 km from Hyper centre Toulouse: T3 à Jeanne d Arc.

Located in Toulouse, Residhotel Toulouse Centre is 900 metres from the Toulouse Museum and 500 metres from Palais de Justice Metro Station. It offers apartments and studios with free WiFi access. Toulouse Stadium is 2.5 km away.

Each accommodation type is serviced by a lift and includes a TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. A desk and a wardrobe are also provided.

Guests can prepare their own meals at Residhotel Toulouse Centre. Studios and apartments have a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and kitchenware.

This property is 800 metres from Notre-Dame de la Daurade Basilica and a 20-minute walk from the Saint-Raymond Musée.

This hotel is located in Toulouse city centre, next to the Jeanne d’Arc Metro stop. Free Wi-Fi access is provided, and guests have a coffee corner at their disposal in the reception hall.

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture features rooms equipped with air-conditioning. All rooms have a contemporary design, a private bathroom, a TV and a courtesy tray.

There is a 24-hour front desk service.

A Buffet Breakfast is available for guests everyday .

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture is a 5-minute walk from the Basilique Saint-Sernin and an ideal base for discovering the city of Toulouse and the River Garonne.

Set in Toulouse, 800 metres from Zénith de Toulouse, Eklo Toulouse offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 1.8 km of Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a private bathroom and bed linen.

Guests at Eklo Toulouse can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Toulouse Stadium is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Diagora Convention Centre is 14 km from the property. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 3 km away.

hotel_name: Beautiful And Spacious Apt At 19 Min From Downtown
description:
In the centre of Toulouse, located within a short distance of Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Beautiful And Spacious Apt At 19 Min From Downtown offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. It is set 5.1 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5 km from Zénith de Toulouse.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. The property offers city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station, Toulouse-Matabiau Station and Capitole Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 5 km away.

Located in the heart of Toulouse, the Hotel Albert 1er is within walking distance of the famous Place du Capitole and other main attractions. An environment friendly hotel, it has received the European Ecolabel. Toulouse Stadium is 5 km away.

The rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and free WiFi access. There also offer a TV with international channels and a private bathroom with a shower or bath tub.

The breakfast is composed of local and organic produce and consists of bread, seasonal fruit, juice, milk, eggs, cheese, yogurts, cured meat, traditional jams and honey. Soya milk and gluten-free bread are available on request. Room service is also available for breakfast or dinner.

The hotel has partnerships with tourist companies, which enables guests to benefit from special offers. The hotel's staff is happy to help you plan a day exploring this historic city centre. Free guidebooks are available at the hotel's reception.

hotel_name: Nemea Appart Hotel Concorde Toulouse Gare Matabiau
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, next to the Canal du Midi and in front of Toulouse Matabiau Train Station, Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde offers a fitness centre located on the 9th floor, including a sauna.

At Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde each accommodation is air-conditioned and includes a TV as well as free WiFi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

The apartments and studios have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

In-room beauty treatments are available upon request and for an extra charge.

Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde's location makes it an excellent base to discover Toulouse with Toulouse centre and Place du Capitole a 15-minute walk away. Toulouse Blagnac Airport is a 15-minute drive from the property.

Montempô + Apparthôtel Toulouse Cité Internationale, a property with a garden, is situated in Toulouse, 1.8 km from Toulouse Stadium, 4.4 km from Zénith de Toulouse, as well as 7.3 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. Complimentary WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The accommodation comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and kettle, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

A buffet breakfast is available at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Montempô + Apparthôtel Toulouse Cité Internationale include Carmes Metro Station, Jardin Royal and Esquirol Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 9 km from the property.

In the heart of Toulouse historic city centre, 450 metres from Carmes metro station, a 5-minute walk from tramway T2 which goes to the airport, and a 10-minute walk from Capitole Square, Le Clos des Salins is a modern building with free Wi-Fi.

Each apartment has air conditioning, a washing machine, a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and private toilets. There is also a seating area with flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and ironing facilities. The studios have access to a shared washing machine.

Set 16 km from Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, Le Clos des Salins is also just 3 km from the A620 Motorway.

In the heart of Toulouse, set within a short distance of Toulouse Stadium and Le Pont Neuf, Studio Carmes, entrée autonome, climatisé,parking privé payant offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This apartment also features a pool with a view. There is private parking and the property offers an electric vehicle charging station.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with pool views. A dressing room and laundry service is also available.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Carmes Metro Station, Esquirol Metro Station and Jardin Royal. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 8 km away.

hotel_name: Montaudran - Place Dupuy - Vue panoramique - Métro
description:
In the heart of Toulouse, set within a short distance of Jardin Royal and Esquirol Metro Station, Montaudran - Place Dupuy - Vue panoramique - Métro offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is located 4.1 km from Toulouse Stadium and offers a lift. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Carmes Metro Station, Jean-Jaures Metro Station and Capitole Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 8 km from Montaudran - Place Dupuy - Vue panoramique - Métro.

Located in the centre of Toulouse, Hotel Victor Hugo is a 10-minute walk from Matabiau Train Station. It offers free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour reception, 350 metres from Jean Jaurès Metro Station.

Hotel Victor Hugo features 32 sound-proofed and air-conditioned rooms. All include a flat-screen TV.

It is 100 metres from Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station. The famous Place du Capitole is a few minutes walk from the hotel and the regular airport shuttle is 50 metres from the property. Pierre Baudis Convention Centre is also a 5-minute walk away.

hotel_name: T2 Bord de Garonne hypercentre terrasse + Parking
description:
Located 3.2 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 3.8 km from Toulouse Stadium in the centre of Toulouse, T2 Bord de Garonne hypercentre terrasse + Parking provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. It is situated 14 km from Diagora Convention Centre and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 5.8 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely.

The apartment features a terrace, 1 bedroom, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Compans Caffarelli Metro Station, Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 6 km away.

Located in the very heart of Toulouse, Hotels Ours Blanc is in a prime position close to the Wilson, Victor Hugo and Capitole squares. Toulouse Stadium is 3.5 km away.

Hotel Ours Blanc - Wilson boasts 32 elegantly decorated rooms in which to enjoy a quiet and relaxing atmosphere. All rooms are soundproofed, air-conditioned and offer wireless internet access.

The hotel enjoys a central location in the heart of Toulouse, near cinemas, department stores, theatres, museums,and restaurants. Make sure you spend some time discovering the famous Canal du Midi, one of Unesco's World Heritage sites.

hotel_name: Aparthotel Adagio Original Toulouse Centre La Grave
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Aparthotel Adagio Original Toulouse Centre La Grave is set in Toulouse, 2.2 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 2.9 km from Toulouse Stadium. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a dishwasher, coffee machine, and a microwave. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station, Le Pont Neuf and Carmes Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 7 km away.

The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT.
The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk.

In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones.
Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square.

The Continental buffet breakfast breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM.
The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks.

Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel.
The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM.

Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river.

This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

hotel_name: Le Clocher de Rodez Centre Gare
description:
Hôtel Le Clocher de Rodez is located in the heart of Toulouse, 700 metres from the Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station. It offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at Le Clocher de Rodez hotel is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Rooms are serviced by a lift and have a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Clocher de Rodez.

The hotel provides a 24-hour reception, and massages are also available upon request.

Le Clocher de Rodez is close to Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and 600 metres from the Capitole Square. A public shuttle service to Blagnac Airport runs every 20 minutes. Toulouse Stadium is 4.5 km from the property.

Situated conveniently in the centre of Toulouse, OVYO Hôtel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At OVYO Hôtel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Pont Neuf, Carmes Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 8 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Right in the heart of Biarritz, Studio Bellevue Clemenceau-2 by Interhome has sea views from the balcony. This 2-star apartment offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from Grande Plage.

The apartment features a TV. A microwave, a fridge and a stovetop can be found in the kitchenette.

Plage Pêcheurs is 200 metres from the apartment, while Plage Port Vieux is 600 metres from the property. Biarritz Airport is 5 km away.

Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box and selected rooms include city views. All units in Hotel Le M are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Le M include Vieux Port Metro station, Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km away.

hotel_name: " Le Barthélémy " Appartements neufs climatisés tout équipés au coeur de Marseille
description:
Offering a terrace and quiet street view, " Le Barthélémy " Appartements neufs climatisés tout équipés au coeur de Marseille is located in Marseille, 1.7 km from Castellane Metro Station and 1.2 km from Saint-Ferreol Street. The property features garden and city views, and is 1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Vieux Port Metro station is 1.3 km away.

Some units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a coffee machine, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, every unit has a private bathroom.

La Timone Metro Station is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 2.6 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km from the property.

Situated in Marseille, STUDIO VIEUX-PORT VUE BASILIQUE NOTRE-DAME features city views and free WiFi, 600 metres from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station. The property is around 1.8 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 2.8 km from Castellane Metro Station and 3.4 km from Palais du Pharo. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans.

Residhome Marseille is situated in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, 2.7 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.8 km from Plage de Maldorme. Free WiFi is available. Public paid parking is also available nearby.

The aparthotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Batterie des Lions is 2.8 km from Residhome Marseille, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

Hostel Vertigo Vieux Port is located 5 minutes from the old port. Its central location means you can enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.
The first beach is a 15-minute walk away, France's oldest district, the Panier, is 20 minutes away, as is the iconic Bonne Mère, Notre Dame de la Garde cathedral, but be prepared to climb. It's worth it: the views and sunsets are magical! It's a perfect place to have a drink.
Auberge Vertigo is also close to metro, buses and tramway lines, so you can hike in the incredible Parc National des Calanques, stroll the streets, enjoy the beaches and the Mediterranean, and visit the surrounding area and Provence !

You'll find dormitories from 2 to 16 beds, spread out in several buildings around a large flourishing courtyard, where you can soak up the sun, have lunch and meet other guests for a drink. You can use the aromatic garden to flavour your dishes.

Two kitchens are available around the clock, as well as chill-out areas.
A laundry service is available.
Sanitary facilities are in the dormitories (several toilets and showers in the 6-, 8- and 16-bed dormitories).
You can arrive at any time; our team is on hand at reception to welcome you 24 hours a day. Chen-in from 3pm, and checked out at 10am, but feel free to come before or stay after, leaving your luggage in the free luggage room, taking advantage of the communal areas and the kitchen...

The Auberge offers an all-you-can-eat breakfast, served from 8am to 10am, for 6 euros.

The rooms and communal areas are equipped with air conditioning and heating, as well as Wi-Fi.

You can also enjoy the Vertigo bar-restaurant, on the corner of the street, from Tuesday to Saturday, from 6pm to 2am: tapas, bistro, cocktails...
Check out all our easter eggs and win a drink at the bar!


How to get there:

- From Gare Saint-Charles: Line 1, direction La Fourragère, Vieux Port or Estrangin station (15 minutes)
- Parking: Cours d'Estienne d'Orves car park (3 minutes)
https://www.indigoneo.fr/fr/parkings/17103/parking-estienne-dorves

- Le Vélo terminal (city bicycles) on the corner of the street


When you arrive, don't hesitate to ask the team for advice, they'll be delighted to help you discover our beautiful city, and scan the QR codes under your bed to find out about our favourite addresses!

hotel_name: Chic et Bohème à Endoume, à Deux Pas du Vieux-Port
description:
Offering quiet street views, Chic et Bohème à Endoume, à Deux Pas du Vieux-Port is an accommodation situated in Marseille, 1.4 km from Plage des Catalans and 1.8 km from Fausse Monnaie. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Chic et Bohème à Endoume, à Deux Pas du Vieux-Port include Plage de Maldorme, Palais du Pharo and Vieux Port Metro station. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km from the property.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals. Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre. Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

In a prime location in the Saint-Charles district of Marseille, Mouchki is located 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans, less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station and a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is around 1.6 km from Joliette Metro Station, 1.9 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 2.9 km from La Timone Metro Station. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a hot tub.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes.

Guests at Mouchki can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Castellane Metro Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

Well located in the centre of Marseille, Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel, each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available at Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles is located opposite St-Charles SNCF Train Station and is an 8-minute walk from the Old Port. Palais des Congrès, Marseille Exhibition Centre and the Vélodrome Stadium are an 8-minute metro ride away and the hotel offers free WiFi access.

Rooms at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles are decorated in a contemporary style and feature an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one is accessed by a lift, air-conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a shower. Some rooms are available for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast of fresh croissants and fruit juice is offered every morning at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles and is served in the dining room or on the terrace. The hotel also has a bar where guests can enjoy an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Additional hotel facilities include luggage storage at reception. There is a paid car park at the St-Charles SNCF Train Station. Notre Dame de la Garde is 2.5 km away.

Attractively located in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, easyHotel Marseille Euromed is situated 700 metres from Joliette Metro Station, less than 1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and a 17-minute walk from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 1.8 km away and Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the hotel.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

EasyHotel Marseille Euromed offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Castellane Metro Station is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 3.4 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 20 km away.

Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

hotel_name: Le Fortia - Nid douillet sur le Vieux-Port de Marseille
description:
Right in the centre of Marseille, situated within a short distance of Plage des Catalans and Vieux Port Metro station, Le Fortia - Nid douillet sur le Vieux-Port de Marseille offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. The apartments come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen. There is a bathroom with a shower, a towel warmer and a toilet.

You will find bars and restaurants within 200 metres of the property. La Canebière, Marseille’s historic high street, is a 10-minute walk away as well as the EuroMéditerranée business district.
